questions.question: Like is the social interaction of us humans and of AI systems the fundamental to intelligence?
I mean, if we were treating this as a, well, as a machine learning problem, right?
This costs more, that costs less, this costs the same, but I have more people paying money over here, right?
Is there some lesson advice in the sense that no matter what, you should feel empowered?
Are you worried that we might destroy ourselves with nuclear weapons, with AGI, with engineering?
So in some sense, immortality is doing something, preferably positive, so that your great grandchildren know who you are, right?
